author: Ciara O'Brien
title: Apple Maps Dublin driving route requests down 80%
description: Apple using mobility data to assist public health authorities
content: Apple Maps data shows an 80 per cent decline in driving and walking route requests in Dublin compared with mid-January, with transit requests 92 per cent lower. In the State as a whole, the data shows a 75 per cent drop in driving route requests and a 74 per … [+1843 chars]
